Precautions: Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids.
Avoid strenuous outdoor activities during the hottest part of the day.
Wear loose, lightweight clothing made from natural fibers.
Take precautions to protect your skin from the sun, such as wearing a hat, sunglasses, and sunscreen.
Check on elderly neighbors and relatives to make sure they are staying cool and hydrated.
Keep your pets indoors during the hottest part of the day.
